ICG

Checkerboard

Introduction to the exercises. Index into a linearized array.
Circle

Warm up in thinking about distances.
Gamma Correction

Understand Gamma Correction.
CMYK

Understand transformation between colour spaces.
Quantise

Posterise an image in multiple ways.
Raytracing

Basic Raytracing.
Phong

Introduce light in your life.
Transformations

Transform objects with matrices.
Scene Graph

Arrange objects in a hierarchical data structure and render them.
Rasterisation

Understand rasterisation with WebGL.
Shading

Use Phong lighting and texturing to improve the rendering.
Perspective

Bring in perspective.
Animation

Make it move.
